metadata.title: CVE-2024-22181 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the readNODE functionalityof libigl v2.5.0. A specially crafted .node file can lead to anout-of-bounds write. An attacker can provide a malicious file to triggerthis vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
